co.cask.cdap.api.worker

Class AbstractWorker

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.cask.cdap.api.worker.AbstractWorker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProgramLifecycle<WorkerContext>, Worker, Runnable

    public abstract class AbstractWorker
extends Object
implements Worker
    Extend this class to add workers.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Description copied from interface: Worker
        Request to stop the running worker. This method will be invoked from a different thread than the one calling the Runnable.run() method.
        Specified by:
        stop in interface Worker

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
        Description copied from interface: ProgramLifecycle
        Destroy is the last thing that gets called before the program is shutdown. So, if there are any cleanups then they can be specified here.
        Specified by:
        destroy in interface ProgramLifecycle<WorkerContext>
